name: DandeLion (Annika_Riik, franka.b2346, Tomoopera, ElisahKDW)
description:
International College Jam #1 project! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You are a flower, you need sunlight. 

Play as a lion - a DandeLion - who's stuck in a cave. You are a flower, you need sunlight to live. Find a way out, defeat the enemies in your way, and bask in the sunlight like you were meant to do.

Art: Annika Riikonen & Elisah Koldewe

Code: Lahja Pulkkinen

Level Design: Franka Bentvelsen
